channel.title: How do i align this? someone please help
channel.description: hey i gave tried everything to align the text with the skill but nothing seems to work if anyone could help me id really appreciate it. Thank you.

item.title: How do i align this? someone please help
item.dc:creator: @beast14 beast14
item.description:
@beast14 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:545467”]It helps if you post the code related to your skill tab.

do you have Skype?

Oh so you fixed your tooltips then? because last I knew you didn’t know how to make them work…[/quote]
